name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted Settings
summary: An NFS13SAVE file is a configuration file used by the PC version of Need for Speed: Most Wanted. It contains a user's game settings or control configurations (such as controls mapped to a keyboard, gamepad, or steering wheel). NFS13SAVE files are stored in the ~/​Criterion Games/​Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted/​Save directory.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Electronic Arts Need for Speed: Most Wanted
